page.title: 12LAW AND ORDER IN TILMANSTONE
page.content:
{ Law_breaking}connected with the A256 road,{speeding, accidents}or{incidents involving 32_tonne lorries occur every few months; some have been{fatal.}Vil_ lagers are concerned about{junctions with the A256; and the Colliery road in particular. There is little{vandalism}but{burg_ {laries}have caused concern as there is no resident policeman. Our{'local' {policeman}at{Eythorne}also covers Elvington. A 999 call brings{police {officers}from{Whitfield,}near Dover.
Local{Hunt Meets}are policed by officers from Whitfield who also attend on{Summer Fete}day. During the{Miners Strike}in 1984/5, police from {Metropolitan, Surrey, {Hants, Dorset}and other forces attend_ ed. Some were billeted at Pegwell Bay Hoverport and travelled in daily.
